title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-2.18 - Frozen foods
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-2.18 - Frozen foods

State Regulations

Foods intended for sale in a frozen state shall be
displayed in a frozen state, except for defrost cycles and brief periods of
loading or unloading. Frozen foods should be displayed below or behind product
food lines according to cabinet manufacturers specifications. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
§§
271-2.18

Repealed

New

York State Register June 22, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 25, eff. 6/22/2016

Adopted

New

York State Register December 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 51, eff. 12/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
